files.patch:
@@ -162,1 +162,1 @@
-    if ((UseAVX > 2) && (VM_Version::supports_avx512vl() || vlen == 64))
+    if ((UseAVX > 2) && (VM_Version::supports_avx512vl() || type2aelembytes(bt) * vlen == 64))
@@ -171,1 +171,1 @@
-          ((UseAVX >= 2) || (vlen <= 8)))
+          ((UseAVX >= 2) || (type2aelembytes(bt) * vlen <= 8)))
